header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 275-60r18 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA
Consistently rated as excellent by 275-60r18 drivers
With similar, but improved specs to the factory tire

content.body:
### Shop 275/60R18 Tire Size
275/60R18 tires are mostly found attached on popular SUVs of the previous decades like the Lexus LX470, Toyota Land Cruiser, GMC, and Mitsubishi Pajero. These SUVs have been admired for their highly impressive on- and off-the-road performance, and might’ve rolled out of the factory with a set of Michelin Pilot LTX or [Bridgestone Dueler H/T 684](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/dueler-h-t-684) tires attached.

Popular vehicles: 
2003-2007 Lexus LX470
2003-2007 Toyota Land Cruiser
2006-2008 GMC Acadia
2001-2015 Mitsubishi Pajero

All-season tires offer year-round performance and provide the convenience of keeping only one set of tires attached throughout the year. Consider the General Grabber HTS, [Hankook Dynapro HP2 (RA33)](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/dynapro-hp2-ra33), or Falken Ziex CT60 A/S if you need a set of 275/60R18 tires that performs in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions.

Highway tires are commonly used on light trucks and SUVs that typically haul materials or need to run on highways and do some off-roading. Take a look at the Michelin Latitude Tour HP or [Yokohama Geolander H/T G056](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/geolandar-h-t-g056) if you need a set of 275/60R18 tires for highway terrains.

Whether you drive a Toyota Land Cruiser, Lexus LX470, Mitsubishi Pajero, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 275/60R18 tires that meet your needs at a greater price!

info.title: Did you know?
